item.description:
Near the sleepy town of Winterhaven, a ruined keep overlooks a dormant gateway to the otherworldly realm known as the Shadowfell. Though this dark scar on the world has lain dormant for many years, an evil cleric of Orcus, Demon Prince of the Undead, seeks to reopen the gate. The only thing preventing the forces of darkness from sweeping across the land is a determined band of heroes...

The fourth night of a new ongoing RPGA campaign! Bring your 1st and 2nd level characters and a hearty appetite for adventure, new players are welcome and can join in on the adventure!

There will also be an alternate RPGA single night adventure, TBD, in case anyone has already played the main adventure or if you do not want to play a multi-night adventure!

So come on out had have a fun night gaming!
item.name: D&D RPGA Game Night - Keep on the Shadowfell IV
